医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
VANCE 试验标志着实体瘤 T 细胞治疗的里程碑有史以来最大规模的实体瘤T细胞治疗临床试验已经结束，预示着精准T细胞治疗的新时代。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/VANCE-trial-marks-milestone-in-t-cell-therapy-for-solid-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/VANCE-trial-marks-milestone-in-t-cell-therapy-for-solid-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26c6b678-f16d-44ea-8998-0a8aca1967e9 Mon, 11 Nov 2024 17:10:06 -0500 VANCE trial marks milestone in t cell therapy for solid tumors
历史红线继续影响受影响社区的艾滋病毒治疗杜兰大学的一项新研究发现，历史上基于种族的贷款做法仍然影响着今天的健康，将这些歧视性政策与受影响社区内有效艾滋病毒治疗的延误联系起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Historical-redlined-continues-to-affect-HIV-treatment-in-affected-communities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Historical-redlined-continues-to-affect-HIV-treatment-in-affected-communities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=465d571f-6ece-475a-a83e-f6b0f21d4fbc Mon, 11 Nov 2024 17:00:36 -0500 Historical redlining continues to affect HIV treatment in affected communities
研究表明哮喘与儿童记忆缺陷有关加州大学戴维斯分校的一项新研究表明，哮喘与儿童记忆困难有关，哮喘早期发作可能会加剧记忆缺陷。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Study-links-asthma-to-memory-deficits-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Study-links-asthma-to-memory-deficits-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4459554c-8f65-4e48-8a2e-0e78b824762e Mon, 11 Nov 2024 16:54:35 -0500 Study links asthma to memory deficits in children
新的遗传模型提供了对乳腺癌转移的见解密歇根州立大学研究人员研究乳腺癌的新模型可以帮助科学家更好地了解癌症转移的原因和地点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/New-genic-model-offers-insights-into-breast-cancer-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/New-genic-model-offers-insights-into-breast-cancer-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57cad13a-0888-4259-98bc-902ea90b4baf Mon, 11 Nov 2024 16:46:44 -0500 New genetic model offers insights into breast cancer metastasis
心脏骤停后 10 分钟内进行旁观者心肺复苏可增加生存机会和大脑恢复非专业施救者（旁观者）越早在家中或公共场合对心脏骤停的人（心脏骤停后 10 分钟）开始心肺复苏 (CPR)，挽救该人生命并保护其大脑功能的机会就越大。根据将于 2024 年美国心脏协会复苏科学研讨会上发表的初步研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Bystander-CPR-within-10-minutes-of-cardiac-arrest-increases-survival-chances-and-brain-recovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Bystander-CPR-within-10-minutes-of-cardiac-arrest-increases-survival-chances-and-brain-recovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5a3ea5f-311d-417a-8715-ef8f838605cd Mon, 11 Nov 2024 14:58:29 -0500 Bystander CPR within 10 minutes of cardiac arrest increases survival chances and brain recovery
1999 年至 2020 年间，美国与肥胖相关的心脏病死亡人数急剧上升根据即将在美国心脏协会 (American Heart) 上发表的一项初步研究，1999 年至 2020 年间，美国与肥胖相关的心脏病死亡人数增加了 180%，尤其是中年男性、黑人成年人、中西部各州和非大都市地区的居民2024 年协会科学会议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Obesity-lated-heart-disease-deaths-rise-sharply-in-the-US- Between-1999-and-2020.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Obesity-lated-heart-disease-deaths-rise-sharply-in-the-US- Between-1999-and-2020.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25369731-f20c-4917-a318-70bb151e8ffa Mon, 11 Nov 2024 11:47:37 -0500 Obesity-related heart disease deaths rise sharply in the U.S. between 1999 and 2020
COVID-19 大流行导致心脏骤停存活率显着下降根据将于 2020 年 COVID-19 大流行爆发时院外心脏骤停存活率大幅下降，并继续低于 2015-2019 年大流行前的水平。美国心脏协会 2024 年科学会议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/COVID-19-pandemic-led-to-significant-decline-in-cardiac-arrest-survival-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/COVID-19-pandemic-led-to-significant-decline-in-cardiac-arrest-survival-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d2b4b7d-56a1-4896-afb2-81d74b693e42 Mon, 11 Nov 2024 11:45:17 -0500 COVID-19 pandemic led to significant decline in cardiac arrest survival rates
基于人工智能的视频系统可以提供快速、非接触式的高血压和糖尿病筛查结合了高速视频和人工智能 (AI) 驱动算法的新系统可以提供快速、非接触式的高血压和 1 型或 2 型糖尿病筛查，无需验血、血压袖带或昂贵的可穿戴设备，根据将于 2024 年美国心脏协会科学会议上发表的一项初步研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/AI-based-video-system-may-offer-quick-no-contact-screenings-for-high-blood-Pressure-and-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/AI-based-video-system-may-offer-quick-no-contact-screenings-for-high-blood-Pressure-and-diabetes.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5db19c65-cc9a-4d62-96c8-b08bfc5a5b7b Mon, 11 Nov 2024 11:31:09 -0500 AI-based video system may offer quick, no-contact screenings for high blood pressure and diabetes
每天只需活动五分钟即可降低血压每天适度的锻炼（只要五分钟）就可以降低血压，而较长的活动时间则具有显着的好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Just-五分钟-of-activity-a-day-could-reduce-blood-Pressure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Just- Five-millions-of-activity-a-day-could-reduce-blood-Pressure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16a77843-5fea-4ca3-8a7b-e4c9e5f168ff Mon, 11 Nov 2024 10:50:00 -0500 Just five minutes of activity a day could reduce blood pressure
饮用非发酵奶可能会增加女性患心脏病的风险该研究表明，未发酵牛奶可能会增加女性患缺血性心脏病的风险，敦促人们更仔细地研究乳制品消费及其对健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Drinking-non-fermented-milk-may-increase-the-risk-of-heart-disease-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Drinking-non-fermented-milk-may-increase-the-risk-of-heart-disease-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=261e1286-1b48-48a5-8dce-f07b9ad7f53b Mon, 11 Nov 2024 10:22:00 -0500 Drinking non-fermented milk may increase the risk of heart disease in women
